Publication Title: Ultrasensitive detection of circulating LINE-1 ORF1p as a specific multi-cancer biomarker
Publication Authors: Martin S Taylor, Connie Wu, Peter C Fridy, Stephanie J Zhang, Yasmeen Senussi, Justina C Wolters, Tatiana Cajuso, Wen-Chih Cheng, John D Heaps, Bryant D Miller, Kei Mori, Limor Cohen, Hua Jiang, Kelly R Molloy, Brian T Chait, Michael G Goggins, Irun Bhan, Joseph W Franses, Xiaoyu Yang, Mary-Ellen Taplin, Xinan Wang, David C Christiani, Bruce E Johnson, Matthew Meyerson, Ravindra Uppaluri, Ann Mari(Read more on Pubmed)
Publication Abstract: Improved biomarkers are needed for early cancer detection, risk stratification, treatment selection, and monitoring treatment response. While proteins can be useful blood-based biomarkers, many have limited sensitivity or specificity for these applications. Publication Title: The landscape of human SVA retrotransposons
Publication Authors: Chong Chu, Eric W Lin, Antuan Tran, Hu Jin, Natalie I Ho, Alexander Veit, Isidro Cortes-Ciriano, Kathleen H Burns, David T Ting, Peter J Park
Publication Abstract: SINE-VNTR-Alu (SVA) retrotransposons are evolutionarily young and still-active transposable elements (TEs) in the human genome. Several pathogenic SVA insertions have been identified that directly mutate host genes to cause neurodegenerative and other types of diseases.
